title: Flashlight, "Lite Years", ca. 1980
markings:
On left side of body:  "(logo) BLACK & DECKER/ Lite Years"

On opposite side, molded in plastic: "Cat no UFL100 Type 1 Caution: Do not incinerate / Black & Decker Inc. Shelton, CT 06484 U.S.A. Made in Mexico"
creditline: Gift of Barbara and Max Pine
description: One-piece black plastic body of flat rectangular form flaring into circular lamp housing; black plastic on/off switch at top near lamp.

exhibitions.title: IDEO Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Flashlight, "Lite Years", ca. 1980.
ca. 1980. Plastic, metal. Gift of Barbara and Max Pine. 1993-133-4.
